amendment.description: Amendment creates youth entrepreneurship programs in the Small Business Administration to assist the development of new businesses by young people who remain in their local area.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 111-317 to create youth entrepreneurship programs in the Small Business Administration to assist the development of new businesses by young people who remain in their local area.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massa amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Massa.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massa amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
